title: The different neighbours around Type-1 and Type-2 active galactic nuclei
title_cn: 1型和2型活跃银河核周围的不同邻居

title: Emergence of charge density wave domain walls above the superconducting dome in 1T-TiSe2
title_cn: 1T-TiSe2中超导圆顶上方电荷密度波畴壁的出现

title: Adaptive pumping for spectral control of random lasers
title_cn: 自适应泵浦用于随机激光器的光谱控制

title_cn: 太赫兹控制纳米尖端的光发射

title: Two-stage magnetic-field-tuned superconductor–insulator transition in underdoped La2−xSrxCuO4
title_cn: 掺杂不足的La2-xSrxCuO4中的两阶段磁场调谐超导体-绝缘体跃迁
abstract: In the underdoped pseudogap regime of cuprate superconductors, the normal state is commonly probed by applying a magnetic field (H). However, the nature of the H-induced resistive state has been the subject of a long-term debate, and clear evidence for a zero-temperature H-tuned superconductor–insulator transition has proved elusive. Here we report magnetoresistance measurements on underdoped La2−xSrxCuO4, providing striking evidence for quantum-critical behaviour of the resistivity—the signature of a H-driven superconductor–insulator transition. The transition is not direct, being accompanied by the emergence of an intermediate state, which is a superconductor only at temperature T = 0. Our finding of a two-stage H-driven superconductor–insulator transition goes beyond the conventional scenario in which a single quantum critical point separates the superconductor and the insulator in the presence of a perpendicular magnetic field. Similar two-stage H-driven superconductor–insulator transitions, in which both disorder and quantum phase fluctuations play an important role, may also be expected in other copper-oxide high-temperature superconductors.
abstract_cn: 在铜酸盐超导体的掺杂不足的伪间隙态中，通常通过施加磁场（H）来探测正常状态。但是，H感应电阻状态的性质一直是长期争论的主题，并且零温度H调谐超导体和绝缘子转变的明确证据已被证明是可望而不可及的。在这里，我们报告了对掺杂不足的La 2＆＃8722; x Sr x CuO 4 的磁阻测量，为电阻率的量子临界行为提供了惊人的证据。 ＃8212; H驱动的超导体绝缘体过渡的签名。该转变不是直接的，伴随着中间状态的出现，该中间状态仅在温度T＆= 160时才是超导体。我们发现的两级H驱动超导体绝缘体转变超出了常规情况，在传统情况下，单个量子临界点在存在垂直磁场的情况下将超导体和绝缘体分开。在其他氧化铜高温超导体中，也可能会出现类似的两级H驱动超导体绝缘体跃迁，其中无序和量子相位波动都起着重要作用。

title: Remarkable effects of disorder on superconductivity of single atomic layers of lead on silicon
title_cn: 无序对硅上铅单原子层超导性的显着影响
abstract: In bulk materials, superconductivity is remarkably robust with respect to non-magnetic disorder. In the two-dimensional limit, however, disorder and electron correlations both tend to destroy the quantum condensate. Here we study, both experimentally and theoretically, the effect of structural disorder on the local spectral response of crystalline superconducting monolayers of lead on silicon. In a direct scanning tunnelling microscopy measurement, we reveal how the local superconducting spectra lose their conventional character and show variations at scales significantly shorter than the coherence length. We demonstrate that the precise atomic organization determines the robustness of the superconducting order with respect to structural defects, such as single atomic steps, which may disrupt superconductivity and act as native Josephson barriers. We expect that our results will improve the understanding of microscopic processes in surface and interface superconductivity, and will open a new way of engineering atomic-scale superconducting quantum devices.
abstract_cn: 在散装材料中，超导性对于非磁性无序性非常强。然而，在二维范围内，无序和电子相关性都倾向于破坏量子凝聚。在这里，我们在实验和理论上都研究了结构无序对硅上铅的晶体超导单分子层的局部光谱响应的影响。在直接扫描隧道显微镜测量中，我们揭示了局部超导光谱如何失去其常规特性，并显示出比相干长度短得多的尺度变化。我们证明精确的原子组织决定了有关结构缺陷（例如单个原子台阶）的超导顺序的鲁棒性，这可能会破坏超导性并充当天然约瑟夫森势垒。我们希望我们的结果将增进对表面和界面超导电性微观过程的理解，并将开辟一种工程化原子级超导量子器件的新方法。

title: Commensurate–incommensurate transition in graphene on hexagonal boron nitride
title_cn: 六方氮化硼上石墨烯的相称-相称过渡
abstract: When a crystal is subjected to a periodic potential, under certain circumstances it can adjust itself to follow the periodicity of the potential, resulting in a commensurate state. Of particular interest are topological defects between the two commensurate phases, such as solitons and domain walls. Here we report a commensurate–incommensurate transition for graphene on top of hexagonal boron nitride (hBN). Depending on the rotation angle between the lattices of the two crystals, graphene can either stretch to adapt to a slightly different hBN periodicity (for small angles, resulting in a commensurate state) or exhibit little adjustment (the incommensurate state). In the commensurate state, areas with matching lattice constants are separated by domain walls that accumulate the generated strain. Such soliton-like objects are not only of significant fundamental interest, but their presence could also explain recent experiments where electronic and optical properties of graphene-hBN heterostructures were observed to be considerably altered.
abstract_cn: 当晶体经受周期性电势时，在某些情况下，它可以调整自身以跟随电势的周期性，从而产生相称的状态。特别重要的是两个相称相之间的拓扑缺陷，例如孤子和畴壁。在这里，我们报告了六方氮化硼（hBN）上方石墨烯的相称与相称过渡。取决于两个晶体的晶格之间的旋转角度，石墨烯可以拉伸以适应稍有不同的hBN周期性（对于小角度，导致相称的状态），或者显示很少的调整（相称的状态）。在相称的状态下，具有相匹配的晶格常数的区域被累积生成的应变的畴壁分隔开。此类孤子物体不仅具有重要的根本意义，而且它们的存在也可以解释最近的实验，观察到石墨烯-hBN异质结构的电子和光学性质发生了很大变化。

title: Universal features in the energetics of symmetry breaking
title_cn: 对称破坏能学中的普遍特征
abstract: A breaking of symmetry involves an abrupt change in the set of microstates a system can explore. This change has unavoidable thermodynamic implications: a shrinkage of the microstate set results in an entropy decrease, which eventually needs to be compensated by heat dissipation and hence requires work. On the other hand, in a spontaneous symmetry breaking, the available phase-space volume changes without the need for work, yielding an apparent entropy decrease. Here we show that this entropy decrease is a key ingredient of a Szilard engine and Landauer’s principle, and perform a direct measurement of the entropy change along symmetry-breaking transitions for a Brownian particle subject to a bistable potential realized through two optical traps. The experiment confirms theoretical results based on fluctuation theorems, enables the construction of a Szilard engine extracting energy from a single thermal bath, and shows that a signature of a symmetry breaking in a system’s energetics is observable.
abstract_cn: 对称性的破坏涉及系统可以探索的一组微状态的突然变化。这种变化不可避免地具有热力学影响：微状态集的收缩会导致熵的降低，最终需要通过散热来补偿熵，因此需要进行工作。另一方面，在自发对称破坏中，可用相空间体积发生变化而无需做功，导致表观熵降低。在这里，我们表明，熵的降低是Szilard引擎和Landauer原理的关键组成部分，并且通过两个光学实现的双稳态势，对布朗粒子沿对称破坏跃迁进行熵变的直接测量。陷阱。实验证实了基于波动定理的理论结果，使Szilard发动机的构造能够从单个热浴中提取能量，并显示出系统能量学中对称性破坏的迹象是可见的。</ p>
